baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，許他比丘尼病衣，後不與者，尼薩耆波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 26

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。諸比丘尼語。汝取遮月水衣。自言不用。臨時先取。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 22

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。於住止處棄故僧伽梨唱言。有欲取者取。後還奪者。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 16
